    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Boue et sable des fleuves vers la mer</string>
            <string language="en">Mud and sand from the rivers to the sea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlamm und Sand von den Flüssen zum Meer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lama e areia dos rios ao mar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fango e sabbia dai fiumi al mare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λάσπη και άμμος από τους ποταμούς στη θάλασσα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fango y arena de los ríos al mar</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre des couches alternatives de boue et de sable que le fleuve transporte à différents moments.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows alternating layers of mud and sand which the river carries to the at different times.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">boue</string>
            <string language="en">mud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fleuves</string>
            <string language="en">Rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sable</string>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mer</string>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sédiments</string>
            <string language="en">sediments</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt wechselnde Schichten des 
Schlammes und des Sandes, welches der Fluß zu zu den 
unterschiedlichen Zeiten trägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra camadas alternas de lama
e de areia qual o rio carrega ao em horas diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli strati alternati 
di fango e della sabbia quale il fiume trasporta al ai tempi 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εναλλασσόμενα στρώματα 
της λάσπης και της άμμου που ο ποταμός φέρνει στους διαφορετικούς
χρόνους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra capas que se alternan 
del fango y de la arena cuál el río lleva a en diversas horas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlamm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse</string>
          </keyword>
